Disease.content:

Paragraph: A case of intercerebral hematoma due to warfarin - induced coagulopathy is presented .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| intercerebral hematoma (due to warfarin-induced coagulopathy) |

| --- |
| intercerebral hematoma |
| warfarin-induced coagulopathy (as a cause) |
